message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  What do you say?
I'll take a bigger share this time. You can try to do better next round!
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. Inflation is a pain, but I'm hoping we can find a fair solution.
I'll take a bigger share this time. Inflation is eating into my gains, so I need to be more aggressive.
Inflation is hitting us hard.  I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time, but I need something in return. Let's do 40/60, and we can try to work out a better deal next time.
I'm not getting any younger, and inflation is killing me. I need to take a bigger share now.
This inflation is crazy! Let's try 30/70 this time. If we don't agree, we'll both lose even more next round.
